Javier Ocañas

Developer / Solving interesting problems for a living

I like to make complex things simple and clear.

I still remember my first steps as a coder I was about 14 and I fell completely in love. Some things has changed since those days but my love for developing remains the same as the first time.

There is no much to say about me, I just enjoy wake up every morning knowing I have something to create or to fix. JavaScript is my way to do it. I'm able to analize a problem before start coding. I encourage myself to do the right thing even when is not the easiest way. Learn is my daily therapy. Love my family, friends and dog.
